summary: In 1869 Kentucky, a young boy and his friends set out to find a treasure chest hidden by his late father in the Florida Everglades during the Civil War.
cast: Robert Foxworth|Joan Hackett|Peter Ustinov|Vic Morrow|Johnny Doran|Billy 'Pop' Atmore|Jane Wyatt|Virginia Vincent|Robert DoQui|Don Knight|Mills Watson|Dub Taylor|Valentin de Vargas|Dick Van Patten|George Lindsey|Logan Ramsey|Jonathan Daly|John Myhers|Warde Donovan|James Brodhead|John Steadman|Rex Holman|Clint Ritchie|Ken Renard|Brion James|John Hayes|John C. Flinn III|Louie Elias|Richard Wright|David S. Cass Sr.|Jimmie Booth|Peter Paul Eastman|George Golden|Eugene Jackson|Michael Mann|Murray Pollack|John Quijada|Cosmo Sardo|Norman Stevans|Robert Strong|Dick Winslow
title: El tesoro de Matecumbe
